name: ev2
description: EV2 Application - Backend, Frontend, and Database

scripts.version:bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:bump:major: npm version major && npm run version:sync
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd back && npm install && cd ../front && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf back/dist front/dist back/node_modules front/node_modules node_modules

author: EV2 Team
